title: Is Artificial Superintelligence Inevitable by 2027?
description: In a groundbreaking revelation at this year’s Beneficial AGI Summit, renowned AI expert Ben Goertzel has stirred the scientific community by predicting the advent of artificial superintelligence (ASI) by 2027. Departing from earlier projections, Goertzel’s forecast suggests a significant acceleration in the development of artificial general intelligence (AGI) and its subsequent evolution into ASI. As […]
